entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 March 2023
